entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
